title: Verify: Integrate Zustand for State Management
description:
Run automated tests for task T-016.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Add Zustand to frontend and refactor state management for workflow state, execution state, and settings to use Zustand stores.
Criteria:
- Zustand installed and configured
- Global state managed via Zustand
- No redundant state in React context
acceptance_criteria: No redundant state in React context
